alert.note: Alert for Clark; Codington; Day; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 06 at 8:24PM MDT until April 07 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Dakota and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The higher snow accumulations are expected along the ridge lines of the Prairie Coteau. Strong winds and slick conditions will have a cumulative effect, potentially making travel hazardous, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
